desc: Handcrafted sterling silver jewellery, minimalist with a boho twist. Jewellery designer and maker, Tara, specialises in dainty, everyday easy to wear jewellery. Ear cuffs and toe rings, rings and necklaces, earrings and pendants. Little pieces of wonder to bring a little joy to everyday.

layout.text:
handmade pieces of wonder
minimal designs with a boho twist
